question: Which among the following is the leading founder of the new institutionalism approach?
explanation: James G. March and Johan P. Olsen are considered as the two leading founders of the new institutionalism and they also wrote the book, â€œThe New Institutionalism: Organizational Factors in Political Life" which was published in 1984 and Rediscovering Institutions: The Organizational Basis of Politics which was published in 1989.
